info.title: BINGO API
info.description:
# How to authenticate with the Bingo API

## JWT Authentication

1. Send a POST request to `/api/auth/token/` with your credentials:
```json
{
  "email": "your-email@example.com",
  "password": "your-password"
}
```

2. You will receive a response containing `access` and `refresh` tokens:
```json
{
  "access": "eyJ0eXAiOiJ....",
  "refresh": "eyJ0eXAiOiJ...."
}
```

3. In Swagger UI, click the 'Authorize' button and enter your access token with the 'Bearer' prefix:
```
Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJ....
```

4. Now you can make authenticated requests to the API endpoints.
